## Loading packages

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(randomForest)
library(ggplot2)
library(caret)
library(knitr)
library(magrittr)
```

## Loading iris data

```{r}
data(iris)
iris %>%
  head %>%
  kable
```

## Parameters

```{r}
SAMPLE_SIZE <- 0.4
VERBOSE <- FALSE
IMPORTANCE <- TRUE
TREES <-250
METRIC <- "Accuracy"
MTRY <- 2:4
```

## Training and testing sets

```{r}
 
set.seed(pi)
in_train <- createDataPartition(y = iris$Species,
                               p = SAMPLE_SIZE,
                               list = FALSE)

train_iris <- iris[in_train, ]
test_iris <- iris[-in_train, ]
```

# Tuning Random Forest model with `caret`

```{r}
# Training Preprocess
prP <- c("range")

# Training Control
trC <- trainControl(method = "cv",
                    number = 2,
                    verboseIter = VERBOSE)

# Tuning Grid
tnG <- expand.grid(mtry = MTRY)
```

```{r}
model <- train(
  y = train_iris$Species,
  x = subset(train_iris, select = -c(Species)),
  method = "rf",
  ntree = TREES,
  preProcess = prP,
  trControl = trC,
  tuneGrid = tnG,
  do.trace = VERBOSE,
  metric = METRIC,
  maximize = TRUE,
  importance = IMPORTANCE
)
```

```{r}
# 6) MODEL RESULTS

model$modelInfo$label
model$modelType
model$preProcess
model$bestTune
model$results
```

```{r}
ggplot(data  = model$results) +
  geom_line(aes(x = mtry, y = Accuracy, color = "Accuracy")) +
  geom_line(aes(x = mtry, y = Kappa, color = "Kappa")) +
  ggtitle("Model Accuracy (Cross-Validation)") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())
```

```{r}
summary(model)
```

```{r}
model$err.rate
```

```{r}
# 7) MODEL RESULTS ON TESTING DATA

# 7.1) Predictions

predictions <- predict(model, subset(test_iris, select = -c(Species)))


# 7.2) Confusion Matrix

conf_matrix <- confusionMatrix(predictions, test_iris$Species)
conf_matrix
```

```{r}
class(conf_matrix)
```

```{r}
library(ggmodel)
ggplotConfusionMatrix(conf_matrix)
```
